name: SubmarineCraft
description: SubmarineCraft is a game of freely building ships or submarines to explore the ocean. The game offers dozens of blocks to build your submarine in your mind to fight against enemy ships. Each block has its own physical characteristics. There is no blood strip in the game, instead of real-time physical simulation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 64 bit Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB RAM Storage: 512 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
